game.name: Gobble Up!
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stats, Steam Leaderboards
game.shortDescription: Control a tiny blob that can swallow everything smaller than itself. As it eats, it grows bigger. Feed on bacteria, grass, houses, planets, and galaxies. How big can you get?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Control a tiny blob that can swallow everything smaller than itself. As it eats, it grows bigger. Feed on bacteria, grass, houses, planets, and galaxies. How big can you get?
